name: Dude Launch
description:
Dude Launch

Ludum Dare 30 submission

Instructions:

Launch Dudes to the moon (safely). CYAN means safe, RED and BLUE mean death.

Normal Game: There are 10 levels. Can you beat it?

Endless Mode: What's the highest score you can get?

Infinite Dudes (Sandbox Mode): Launch as many dudes as you want, no regrets!

Controls:

Press and hold A and L to move the boat.

Press and hold S and K to move the ladder.

Press SPACE to launch dudes.

Press ESC to quit the level.

Press M to mute the music.
